dryad:DryadDataFile.dcterms:title: LiDAR and field data for Dyke Marsh
dryad:DryadDataFile.dcterms:description: LiDAR point files (Ground and All Points) collected in 2012; RTK GPS point files collected in 2012 and 2013; Field data on plant litter and surface soils; and some derived data from the LiDAR survey at the locations of plots and RTK elevations.
dryad:DryadDataFile.dcterms:subject: Tidal freshwater marsh

light detection and ranging
sea level rise
wetlands
sediment
organic matter
